org.grobid.core.lang

Interface LanguageDetector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CybozuLanguageDetector

    public interface LanguageDetector
    User: zholudev Date: 11/24/11 Time: 11:03 AM

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Language detect(String text)
      Detects a language id that must consist of two letter together with a confidence coefficient.

    • Method Detail

      • detect

        Language detect(String text)
        Detects a language id that must consist of two letter together with a confidence coefficient. If coefficient cannot be provided for some reason, it should be 1.0
        Parameters:
        text - text to detect a language from
        Returns:
        a language id together with a confidence coefficient
